titlestmt.titleproper: Donald W. Reichle Audio Fidelity Collection
titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: MRC

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Donald W. Reichle Audio Fidelity Collection
did.abstract: Collection of record albums (33-1/3) and various other formats from Audio Fidelity, a small recording company started in 1950 that offered very high technical specifications for early hi-fi and stereo audiophiles. There is also a detailed discography for the company.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Audio Fidelity (1954-1984) was a small recording company based in New York City that offered very high technical specifications for early hi-fi and stereo audiophiles. The company was the first to cut a stereo LP for release (side 1 was The Dukes of Dixieland, side 2 was railroad sound effects), and Sidney Frey, its founder and president, was known as "Mr. Stereo" for his pioneering work in making stereophonic sound recordings widely available. Notable artists appearing on the Audio Fidelity label include Louis Armstrong, Al Hirt, Lalo Schifrin, Oscar Brand, Lionel Hampton, Larry Adler, Johnny Puleo, Patachou, Mohammed El-Bakkar, Leon Berry, Eddie Cantor, and many others

In 1985 the company changed its name to Milestone Records and in 1997 was purchased out of bankruptcy. The name "Audio Fidelity Records" is presently (2011) licensed to Morada Enterprises, which releases specialty CDs; the original Audio Fidelity catalog is currently (2011) being released under the Max Cat Records reissue label.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Donald W. Reichle Audio Fidelity Collection consists of recordings on the Audio Fidelity label. The majority are 33-1/3 record albums, with a few other formats also represented.
The collection also contains a CD with an extensive and comprehensive Audio Fidelity discography, compiled by the donor. The discography is interactive and contains the following information:

list.item: Album Titles - Album Titles listed in Alpha Order (large file)
Album Jackets - More than 650 images of album jackets, crosslinked with album details
Artists - Artists listed in Order (large file)
Catalog Numbers - All AF Catalog numbers (no details) listed in Order
Auction Bids - On-Line Auction bids listed by catalog number
Matrix Data - Vinyl Record Matrix Data listed by catalog number
AF Catalog Reproductions - Scanned pages from AF catalog inserts and sleeves
Track titles - Nearly 6000 track titles with catalog numbers in order, cross-linked to album details.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and remains in original order.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is currently unprocessed and not available for research. Please contact &scrc_name; for more information.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Donald W. Reichle Audio Fidelity Collection,
&su_name;

note.p: An inventory has not yet been created for this collection. Please contact the Repository listed above for more information.
